channel.title: 667 Should I Release The Construction Skill?
channel.description:
Well iv been working on it for ages. It's 100% working should i release it?
Will I get hate from peeps saying encouriging leechers?
How do i put a poll on this btw?

item.title: 667 Should I Release The Construction Skill?
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:11, topic:452245”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=555131.msg4064967#msg4064967 date=1343784667]
I feel like this shouldn’t even be in here, lol.
[/quote]I was thinking that too when I read the first sentence. But second one changed my mind, and I think it can stay (but barely, it’s very borderline). :o[/quote]

I didn’t also know whether i would get told off by matrix.

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Should I Release The Construction Skill?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:8, topic:452245”]I don’t really like this type of thread (as they seem just attention-seeking to me), but oh well. It’s completely up to you, if you feel like you can release it, you should. It’s great when people further development of RSPS any way they can. Especially if you explain code and maybe make tutorials about HOW you did some of that, it’s worth a lot in these communities.[/quote]This is exactly what I think.

Read full topic
item.source: 667 Should I Release The Construction Skill?

item.title: 667 Should I Release The Construction Skill?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Davidi2:

I don’t really like this type of thread (as they seem just attention-seeking to me), but oh well. It’s completely up to you, if you feel like you can release it, you should. It’s great when people further development of RSPS any way they can. Especially if you explain code and maybe make tutorials about HOW you did some of that, it’s worth a lot in these communities.

I feel like this shouldn’t even be in here, lol.

Read full topic

@davidi2 wrote:

I don’t really like this type of thread (as they seem just attention-seeking to me), but oh well. It’s completely up to you, if you feel like you can release it, you should. It’s great when people further development of RSPS any way they can. Especially if you explain code and maybe make tutorials about HOW you did some of that, it’s worth a lot in these communities.

item.title: 667 Should I Release The Construction Skill?
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

marcbob:

I doubt it’s 100% construction. If it is good though I’d love to go on your server and try it out. It’s my favorite skill and I even have 99 on real rs along with a sick house.

Nice! It is pretty much 100% in the fact it works. Not everything is identice to rs as some parts I just couldn’t do so I added it differently.
